author: Special Correspondent
text:
A week after she and three members of her family were jailed for allegedly assaulting an MTC staff member, a lady lodged a complaint with the Commissioner of Police seeking justice, on Wednesday.

V. Prema (25) and three other members of her family, including her husband Vinod and brother Ramesh, had been jailed for allegedly assaulting a bus conductor last week. Prema had alleged that she had been groped by an MTC staff, while returning home from a movie in Perambur, and a scuffle ensued, resulting in her assaulting the staff. Following a protest by the MTC union, the four were jailed for a few days. Prema lodged a complaint stating that she wanted justice for the way her family was treated and insisted that action be taken against the conductors.
title: MTC incident: woman files complaint, demands justice
